idea: Impact of COVID-19 on health and wellness and its revival process – we all are facing challenges on every breath and as a nation we already have started finding out ways to combat with. We as a society strongly believe that, technology can be leveraged effectively to enforce adherence to social distancing and other precautionary measures to overcome this pandemic. Our SaaS based app DoctoPlus™ (https://doctoplus.in/ ) is one such technology contribution to the nation, which can help in maintaining social / physical distancing during doctor’s appointment, thus avoiding queues inside doctor’s chamber. It also facilitates prescription through tele medicines and digital prescription for a further contact-less experience further contributing to social distancing measures.
name: DoctoPlus

idea:
Schoolnovate

Innovation to fuel schools of tomorrow


Today’s kids demand a smart education system that can make learning fun and more productive. It’s time to revamp old education models and keep upgrading the teaching skills with changing times. Therefore, we bring you Schoolnovate, an innovative and easy-to-use education automation system. 


With Schoolnovate:


  • Schools can create an impactful school profile for greater visibility, make operations paperless and collect fees online. 


  • Teachers can learn new teaching skills, take classes & attendance online as well as issue report cards digitally. 


  • Parents also get to keep track of the child's progress in real-time, stay connected with teachers and avail special offers.
name: NYNESHIA SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SINGH INDUSTRIES Pvt Ltd aims to ascend as a production industry in field of defence and aerospace system (such as assault arms, ammunition and UAV) for defence forces for critical mission and border surveillance technology.


SINGH INDUSTRIES vision is to have excellence in engineering, manufacturing, designing and test for mission critical defence and aerospace system.


Startup in India is to be focused in domestic defence production under MAKE IN INDIA scheme and STARTUP INDIA initiatives and making India a self reliant in defence production and procurement.


Our values is to build trust, commitment, integrity and transparency.
name: SINGH INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED
